data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Amphirhachis Townes, 1970 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Banchinae) from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Watanabe, Kyohei (2017): Revision of the genus Amphirhachis Townes, 1970 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Banchinae) from Japan. ZooKeys 685: 49-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.685.13552, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.685.13552
